timeline.title: The Spark
timeline.description: A group of college students frustrated with corruption decided to stop complaining and start acting. NYA was born in a small hostel room.

timeline.title: First Chapter
timeline.description: Our first official chapter launched in Delhi with 15 founding members. We organized our first awareness campaign reaching 500 students.

timeline.title: Going Pan-India
timeline.description: Expanded to 5 states with 10 active chapters. Launched our reporting platform that received 100+ reports in the first month.

timeline.title: 1000+ Strong
timeline.description: Crossed 1000 active members milestone. Featured in national media for grassroots anti-corruption work. Partnered with 20+ colleges.

timeline.title: The Movement Grows
timeline.description: Present in 15 states with 25+ chapters. Launched campus ambassador program. Youth across India are joining the fight for transparency.
